[[Image:The Calendar of Imladris 1977.jpg|thumb]]

'''The Calendar of Imladris [[1977]]''' was produced by [[Permanent Press]] a division of [[Thorin and Co.]]. It contained fourteen black and white illustrations by [[John Pivovarnick]], [[Michael Logan]], and [[Tom Santoski]]. 

* Dimensions: 11 x 8.5 inches
* Stapled on the fold.
